dotnet new sln --name web-project
dotnet new webapi --name web-project
dotnet sln add .
dotnet build
dotnet run

"bin" and "obj" are autogenerated folders, just build project and they will be created

running at https://localhost:port/swagger

dotnet dev-certs https --trust

dotnet add package Newtonsoft.Json
dotnet add package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore
